languages.text: "При помощи бура на твоем мехадендрите, я угадала? Не стоит, право слово. Только что моя ноша перестала казаться мне такой уж тяжкой".
"Let me guess, it involves the drill on your mechadendrite? There's no need, really! My burden suddenly doesn't seem so heavy."
languages.original_text: "При помощи бура на твоем мехадендрите, я угадала? Не стоит, право слово. Только что моя ноша перестала казаться мне такой уж тяжкой".

traits.locale_text: "Let me guess, it involves the drill on your mechadendrite? There's no need, really! My burden suddenly doesn't seem so heavy."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “让我猜猜，‘纠正问题’得用上你的机械触须，对吗？真的没有必要！我突然觉得这不是什么大事。”
languages.original_text: "Let me guess, it involves the drill on your mechadendrite? There's no need, really! My burden suddenly doesn't seem so heavy."

traits.locale_text: “让我猜猜，‘纠正问题’得用上你的机械触须，对吗？真的没有必要！我突然觉得这不是什么大事。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Laissez-moi deviner... Avec l'aide de la perceuse sur votre mécadendrite ? Franchement, inutile de vous fatiguer ! Mon fardeau n'est finalement pas si lourd. »
languages.original_text: "Let me guess, it involves the drill on your mechadendrite? There's no need, really! My burden suddenly doesn't seem so heavy."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez-moi deviner... Avec l'aide de la perceuse sur votre mécadendrite ? Franchement, inutile de vous fatiguer ! Mon fardeau n'est finalement pas si lourd. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lasst mich raten, es hat etwas mit dem Bohrer an Eurem Mechadendriten zu tun? Das ist wirklich nicht nötig! Meine Last wirkt plötzlich viel leichter."
languages.original_text: "Let me guess, it involves the drill on your mechadendrite? There's no need, really! My burden suddenly doesn't seem so heavy."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst mich raten, es hat etwas mit dem Bohrer an Eurem Mechadendriten zu tun? Das ist wirklich nicht nötig! Meine Last wirkt plötzlich viel leichter."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「当ててみましょうか。機械触手のドリルに関係してるのね？そんな必要はないのに！私の重荷が急に重く感じられなくなったわ」
languages.original_text: "Let me guess, it involves the drill on your mechadendrite? There's no need, really! My burden suddenly doesn't seem so heavy."

traits.locale_text: 「当ててみましょうか。機械触手のドリルに関係してるのね？そんな必要はないのに！私の重荷が急に重く感じられなくなったわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Déjame adivinar, ¿con el taladro de esa mecadendrita? ¡De verdad que no hace falta! De pronto, mi carga no parece tan pesada».
languages.original_text: "Let me guess, it involves the drill on your mechadendrite? There's no need, really! My burden suddenly doesn't seem so heavy."

traits.locale_text: «Déjame adivinar, ¿con el taladro de esa mecadendrita? ¡De verdad que no hace falta! De pronto, mi carga no parece tan pesada».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Let me guess, it involves the drill on your mechadendrite? There's no need, really! My burden suddenly doesn't seem so heavy."

languages.text: "Dur tahmin edeyim, mekadentritindeki matkabı kullanacaksın değil mi? Hiç gerek yok, cidden! O kadar da rahatsız olmuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Let me guess, it involves the drill on your mechadendrite? There's no need, really! My burden suddenly doesn't seem so heavy."
